quotes.text: There is no victory without combat, nor combat without an enemy.
Distrust of yourself is the foundation of the spiritual life.
Trust fully in God and distrust yourself completely.
He who wants to conquer must fight with constancy and fortitude.
Prayer is the most powerful weapon against the spiritual enemy.
Resist temptations at the beginning, when they are easier to overcome.
Humility is the shield that protects us from all enemy attacks.
Do not be discouraged by your falls, rise with greater humility.
Watch over your senses, the doors of the soul.
Inner peace is the fruit of conformity with the divine will.
Mortify your own will to do God's will.
Patience in adversity is a sign of true virtue.
Flee from occasions of sin with diligence.
Love for God is demonstrated in obedience to His commandments.
Be faithful in small things to reach great things.
Daily meditation strengthens the spirit for combat.
Do not seek spiritual consolations, seek the God of consolations.
True devotion consists in doing God's will promptly.
Examine your conscience every day to know your faults.
Interior silence disposes the soul to listen to God.
Guard your heart from disordered affections.
Fraternal charity is the mark of true disciples.
Bear contradictions and humiliations with joy.
Final perseverance is a gift from God obtained through prayer.
Renew each morning your purpose to serve God faithfully.
Do not judge the actions of others, look at your own.
The cross is the sure path to holiness.
Love virtue more than its consolations.
In tribulation true faith is tested.
Be meek and humble of heart like the divine Master.
